FuncDef: This command specifies the error rate at which to declare the signal fail condition for the signal degrade (SD). The value represents an error rate of 10E-value.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the exponent of the error rate, thus an error rate from 10E-3 to 10E-7. Values-5 to 9. ParamDefault: Default- 7
Specifies the coefficient of the SD threshold. Values-10 to 99. ParamDefault: Default- 10
